name: Fox&Tree
description:
How To Play

Use the arrows to move and the mouse to launch seeds.

If you reach the house, you go to the next level.

Resources

Environment created by reach the enD: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/environment-2d-pixel....

Player created by HarvettFox96: https://opengameart.org/content/harvett-fox-player-character-sheet.

Seed created by ScratchIO: https://opengameart.org/content/cereal-seeds.
